credit_line: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
title: Mourning sampler
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Purchased at Drake sale, cat #794, 1913.
medium:
Medium: silk  
Technique: embroidered and painted on plain weave
description: Mourning female figure leaning on a tomb surmounted by an urn under the shade of a weeping willow. Embroidered in tan silk with toned watercolor washes. Trial sketch of head on left margin and trial letters in lower right and bottom margins.
name: Mourning sampler
